resources.string: Blend: Mix in an electric blender.
Build: Fill a glass with ice, and pour in ingredients.
Dash: A short squirt. Technically, 1/6th of a teaspoon.
Fill: Pour up to the top of the glass.
Float: Gently pour on top of a drink.
Layer: Gently add ingredients in layers. You may need a spoon to stop the fall of the pour.
Muddle: Crush ingredients to release flavors. Use a muddling device, or crush between thumb and ice cube.
Rim: Moisten the glass\' rim and sprinkle on the outside. Don\'t overdo it. Subtle is better than cloying..
Splash: A long squirt. Technically, half an ounce.
